name: Keep the light (DonBenzo)
description:
Developpement

Made in 7 hours on Construct 2 for the TriJam 160

Controls 

Use the arrows keys to deplace the character ←↑↓→ 

Goal

Find the house before the lantern switch off. Use the compass to find the house. To reload the light, you need to pick up candles in the forest. Good luck and have fun.
